name: Morphing World
description:
Hi! This is our game made for Game Dev Capstone in university. It is basically a platformer game but you have to build up the map by yourself!!

Due to the time limit, we don't have a credit page for now. The idea is originated from the winner game World Collector in Ludum Dare 45. Some art assets come from http://opengameart.org. Music midi from https://www.midishow.com/en-us/midi/74364.html. Thanks to the authors!

Thanks to everyone for playing!
